message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $20,000. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $20,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  I'd be happy to pay $16,000 for it. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite willing to go that low. I can offer you a compromise at $18,500. It's a great price for a product like this, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,500 is still a bit out of my price range. I'm firm on my previous offer of $16,000.  If you're open to that, we can close the deal. Otherwise, I may have to look elsewhere.
I understand you're firm on your previous offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can meet you halfway at $17,250. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you!

Alice, I appreciate your compromise, but $17,250 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $16,500, which is a fair price considering the value of the product. If you're not willing to come down to that, I'll have to explore other options.
